Summary I'm a Real Time Software System Engineer. I have worked in Hard Real Time and High Level OS environment, from assembly to object languages.  
I have a fairly good understanding of the Hardware part of the System that allow me to work at system level with Hardware engineers with a good added value. 
 
I would qualify myself more as a technologist than a manager, however I have lead several teams, I prefer small teams to be able to stay on the technical side. Being a Manager is not my main objective, I still want to be close to technical stuff and continue to learn. 
 
Currently Performance System SW architect, after a long experience in real time embedded development in all areas, system SW architecture, architecture, design, development, integration. I'm now working on addressing System Performance issues found on Android Phone. The performance issues I'm looking at are User Experience oriented, but can spread anywhere in Android, from Lower Layers to Application layers. This position turns to be more hands on that the previous one. 
 
Prior to that position I did work in system SW architecture several years and driving a Team that was defining the System Architecture. 
 
Due to the nature of my Jobs I have a lot of networking to do outside and inside my company. Summary I'm a Real Time Software System Engineer. I have worked in Hard Real Time and High Level OS environment, from assembly to object languages.
